title: How Do I Fix This?
description:
Cynthia and her husband do not agree on the proper way to parent their kids, and it's damaging their relationship. - Dr. Laura: "It's hard to be a good mother when the poor father you picked thwarts your parenting efforts."

Are you and your spouse on the same parenting page? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
